Class Wiki.User

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wikipedia.Wiki.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    Wiki

    public class Wiki.User
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Serializable
    Subclass for wiki users.

    0.05

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        protected User(String username)
        Creates a new user object. Does not create a new user on the wiki (we don't implement this for a very good reason). Shouldn't be called for anons.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        Since:
        0.05

    • Method Detail

      • getUsername

        public String getUsername()
        Gets this user's username.
        Returns:
        this user's username
        Since:
        0.08

      • getUserInfo

        public Map<String,Object> getUserInfo()
                               throws IOException
        Gets various properties of this user. Groups and rights are cached for the current logged in user. Returns:
        • editcount: (int) countEdits() the user's edit count
        • groups: (String[]) the groups the user is in (see [[Special:Listgrouprights]])
        • rights: (String[]) the stuff the user can do
        • emailable: (Boolean) whether the user can be emailed through [[Special:Emailuser]] or emailUser()
        • blocked: (Boolean) whether the user is blocked
        • gender: (Wiki.Gender) the user's gender
        • created: (Calendar) when the user account was created
        Returns:
        (see above)
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        Since:
        0.24

      • isAllowedTo

        public boolean isAllowedTo(String right)
                    throws IOException
        Returns true if the user is allowed to perform the specified action. Uses the rights cache. Read [[Special:Listgrouprights]] before using this!
        Parameters:
        right - a specific action
        Returns:
        whether the user is allowed to execute it
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        Since:
        0.24

      • isA

        public boolean isA(String group)
            throws IOException
        Returns true if the user is a member of the specified group. Uses the groups cache.
        Parameters:
        group - a specific group
        Returns:
        whether the user is in it
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        Since:
        0.24

      • blockLog

        public Wiki.LogEntry[] blockLog()
                         throws IOException
        Returns a log of the times when the user has been blocked.
        Returns:
        records of the occasions when this user has been blocked
        Throws:
        IOException - if something goes wrong
        Since:
        0.08

      • isBlocked

        public boolean isBlocked()
                  throws IOException
        Determines whether this user is blocked by looking it up on the IP block list.
        Returns:
        whether this user is blocked
        Throws:
        IOException - if we cannot retrieve the IP block list
        Since:
        0.12

      • countEdits

        public int countEdits()
               throws IOException
        Fetches the internal edit count for this user, which includes all live edits and deleted edits after (I think) January 2007. If you want to count live edits only, use the slower int count = user.contribs().length;.
        Returns:
        the user's edit count
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        Since:
        0.16

      • contribs

        public Wiki.Revision[] contribs(int... ns)
                         throws IOException
        Fetches the contributions for this user in a particular namespace(s).
        Parameters:
        ns - a list of namespaces to filter by, empty = all namespaces.
        Returns:
        a revision array of contributions
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        Since:
        0.17
